alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Orange County through 445 PM EDT... At 354 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Phillipsport, or near Ellenville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newburgh, Walden, Gardnertown, Montgomery, Scotchtown, Orange Lake, Washingtonville, Vails Gate, Maybrook, Pine Bush, Circleville and Bullville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
